#summary API : WcapClient
#labels API

= WcapClient class =

== properties ==
 * protected $curl;
 * protected $wcap_url;
 * protected $session_id = null;
 * protected $errno = 0;
 * protected $tzid = 'Europe/Paris';

    * login, logout(),

    * fetchcomponents_by_range(),
    * get_all_time_zones(),
    * store_event(),
    * get_userprefs(),
    * get_calprops(),
    * gettime(),
    * search_calprops(),
    * search_calprops(),
    * list_subscribed(),
    * list(), (list is a reserved word)
    * ping(),
    * check_id(),
    * version(),
    * subscribe_calendars(),
    * unsubscribe_calendars()
    * import, export
